title: Foundations of Strategy
description: This course covers the basic concepts and frameworks of strategy analysis and strategy formulation. Credit will not be awarded for both MGT 3659 and MGT 4195.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: ACCT 2101 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MGT 3000 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
